QueryBasedMemberRetriever.QueryString: SELECT w.IPCODE, 0, nvl(w.cardtype,0) as CARDTYPE, null as TIERLEVEL FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT audience.ipcode, audience.cardtype FROM ( SELECT dat.ipcode, dat.cardtype, COUNT(CASE WHEN dat.RewardName = 'Loyalty Acquisition $5 Reward' THEN 1 END) RewardsIssued FROM ( SELECT lm.ipcode AS IPCODE, md.a_cardtype as cardtype, rd.name AS RewardName FROM bp_ae.lw_loyaltymember lm INNER JOIN bp_ae.ats_memberdetails md ON lm.ipcode = md.a_ipcode LEFT JOIN bp_ae.lw_memberrewards mr ON lm.ipcode = mr.memberid LEFT JOIN bp_ae.lw_rewardsdef rd ON rd.id = mr.rewarddefid WHERE 1 = 1 AND lm.membercreatedate >= TO_DATE('08/15/2019','MM/DD/YYYY') AND lm.membercreatedate < TO_DATE('08/19/2019','MM/DD/YYYY') AND lm.createdate > (SELECT MAX(trunc(To_date(to_char(value),'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) FROM BP_AE.Lw_Clientconfiguration cc where cc.ckey ='LastRewardDate') AND INSTR(md.a_emailaddress,'@')>0 AND (lm.memberstatus = 1 AND md.a_memberstatuscode IS NULL) ) dat GROUP BY dat.ipcode, dat.cardtype ) audience WHERE audience.RewardsIssued=0 ) w
